page.title: 19LANGTOFT GARAGE
page.content: The garage sells petrol,cigarettes, sweets,ice creams,cold drinks,as well as bits and pieces for cars. The brand of petrol that they sell is Roberts Petrolleum.Before it was a garage it was a blacksmiths .As a garage it has been there for 20 years. The opening days are from 7.00 am to 9.00 pm seven days a week.Mr and Mrs Curly have owned the garage for five years.The rates are Â£1,000p/a. Wages Â£21,000p/a.Electricity Â£1,500p/a.Turnover Â£600,000p/a.And about 300 people go there every day and 80% sales of petrol 10% shop 10%repairs service.The best thing that Mr Curly likes is meeting people.
